title: User Registration Success with Email Verification
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid information and receives an email verification link.

steps.description: Navigate to the user registration page.
Fill in valid registration details including email, password, and necessary personal information.
Submit the registration form.
Verify registration success message is displayed.
Verify that an email verification message is sent to the registered email.

title: User Login Success with Verified Email
description: Check that a user with verified email can log in successfully using correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter email and password of a verified user.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login and redirection to the dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Unverified Email
description: Ensure users who have not verified their email cannot log in and receive an appropriate error.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter email and password of a user with unverified email.
Click the login button.
Verify login is denied and a message prompts the user to verify their email.

title: Password Reset via OTP
description: Validate the password reset workflow with OTP generation, validation, and password update.

steps.description: Navigate to the 'Forgot Password' page.
Submit a registered email address for password reset.
Verify OTP is sent to the email.
Enter received OTP and new password.
Confirm password reset form submission.
Verify password is successfully reset and user can log in with the new password.

title: Customer Onboarding with Multi-step KYC and Document Upload
description: Test that onboarding a new customer completes successfully with all KYC steps and document uploads.

steps.description: Log in as an agent and navigate to customer onboarding.
Fill out multi-step KYC form including personal details, address, and identity information.
Upload required KYC documents such as identity proof and address proof.
Submit the completed onboarding form.
Verify that the customer profile is created with status reflecting KYC completion.
Check that uploaded documents are securely stored and accessible.

title: Policy Creation Normal Flow with Premium Calculation and Digital Signature
description: Verify multi-step policy creation including policy selection, nominee entry, medical info, premium calculation, and digital signature integration.

steps.description: Login as agent and navigate to new policy creation.
Select policy type and enter required details.
Enter nominee and medical information.
Trigger premium calculation and verify returned premium value.
Complete the digital signature process.
Generate and download policy PDF.
Verify that the policy is saved with correct details and status 'Active'.
Check that the premium amount is calculated correctly according to business rules.
Verify the policy PDF includes the signature and all entered details.

title: Policy Creation Premium Calculation Edge Cases
description: Verify that the premium calculator handles boundary values and invalid inputs gracefully during policy creation.

steps.description: Enter minimal and maximal allowed ages for insured in the policy form.
Input invalid data such as negative values or non-numeric characters in premium relevant fields.
Verify premium calculation returns valid results for boundary ages, or appropriate error messages for invalid inputs.
Ensure policy creation cannot proceed with invalid inputs and errors are displayed clearly.

title: Claims Registration and Multi-level Approval Workflow
description: Test easy claim registration, document uploads, real-time status updates, and multi-level approval process.

steps.description: Log in as customer and navigate to claim registration.
Fill claim details and upload required documents.
Submit the claim.
Verify claim registration confirmation and initial status.
Log in as claims processor and approve claim at first level.
Verify claim status updates to next approval stage.
Log in as senior approver and approve final claim stage.
Confirm final claim approval status is updated and notification sent to customer.

title: Claims Registration with Missing Required Documents
description: Verify that claim registration fails if necessary documents are not uploaded and proper validation errors are shown.

steps.description: Attempt to register a new claim without uploading mandatory documents.
Submit the claim form.
Verify error messages indicating missing documents appear and claim is not registered.

title: Payment Processing with Multiple Payment Methods
description: Verify payment workflow allowing users to choose payment method, complete payment, and view payment history.

steps.description: Log in as customer and navigate to payments page.
Select a pending premium and choose payment method (credit card, net banking, UPI).
Complete the payment process.
Verify payment success confirmation is shown.
Navigate to payment history page.
Verify recent payment is listed correctly with details.

title: Automated Payment Reminders Delivery
description: Verify that the system sends automated reminders to customers for upcoming premium payments via notification system.

steps.description: Set premium due date close to current date for a customer.
Verify that an automated payment reminder notification is generated and delivered to the customer.

title: Agent Commission Tracking Accuracy
description: Test agent commissions calculation and tracking, ensuring commissions reflect policy sales correctly.

steps.description: Record multiple policy sales by an agent.
Verify commission amount is calculated accurately as per business rules.
Navigate to agent commission page.
Verify commission records are displayed correctly with up-to-date totals.

title: Dashboard Metrics Real-time Updates
description: Verify real-time analytics including business metrics, revenue tracking, claims statistics, and agent leaderboards are displayed properly.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the dashboard.
Validate all key metrics such as policies, claims, revenue, and agent rankings load correctly.
Simulate updates in underlying data (new policy, claim etc.)
Verify dashboard updates dynamically reflecting the data changes.

title: Security: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users cannot access features outside their roles and permissions, e.g., customer cannot access agent management.

steps.description: Log in as a customer and attempt to access admin or agent management pages.
Verify access is denied with appropriate error or redirection.
Log in as an agent and attempt to access admin-only pages.
Verify access is denied or restricted.

title: Security: XSS and CSRF Protection Validation
description: Test that the system sanitizes inputs to prevent XSS and protects critical actions with CSRF tokens.

steps.description: Attempt to inject script tags or malicious payload in input fields such as profile updates or document uploads.
Verify inputs are sanitized and scripts do not execute or persist.
Attempt a state-changing HTTP request without a valid CSRF token.
Verify action is blocked and error returned indicating missing/invalid CSRF token.

title: UI/UX: Responsive Layout and Dark Mode Support
description: Validate that the application UI renders correctly on various screen sizes and supports toggling dark mode with consistent UX.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Verify layout adjusts correctly without content overflow or misalignment.
Toggle dark mode on and off.
Verify theme changes instantly and remains consistent across pages and components.

title: Document Upload Validation and Security
description: Ensure document uploads validate file types, sizes, and are stored securely preventing unauthorized access.

steps.description: Attempt to upload invalid file types (executable, script files) and oversized documents.
Verify upload is rejected with appropriate error messages.
Upload valid documents and verify secure storage.
Verify access to uploaded documents is restricted according to user roles.

title: Performance Benchmark: Page Load and API Response
description: Test page load times and API responses remain within acceptable time thresholds under normal load.

steps.description: Load major pages like dashboard, policy creation, and claims management.
Verify page loads within defined time limits (e.g. < 2 seconds).
Invoke core API endpoints such as registration, login, policy creation.
Verify APIs respond within acceptable latency thresholds (e.g. < 500ms).
